entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Error: The file 'iOS/Resources/LaunchScreen.xib' conflicts with 'iOS/Resources/LaunchScreen.xib'. #2222
  • Error CS0579: Duplicate 'global::Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Xaml.XamlFilePath' attribute #2221
  • Type XXX already defines a member called 'InitializeComponent' with the same parameter types #2220
  • [Bug] TabbedPage->SelectedTabColor no work #2217
  • [Bug] ScrollToAsync appears to go the wrong direction for the supplied Enum #2214
  • [Bug] Image sizing is not working as expected #2213
  • [Bug] No option to specify the font attribute on Canvas #2212
  • [Bug] BlazorWebView crashes and goes black #2211
  • [Bug] Mark one of the Geocoding APIs as obsolete #2209
  • [Bug][Template] Move splash screen to Resources\Images folder of the template #2208
  • [Bug][Template] Add AssemblyInfo.cs to the template #2207
  • Path Do not Work in MAUI #2206

Closed

  • [Bug] BackgroundColor doesn't update when applied to Page #2152
    partner, partner/ui-tools, 6.0.100-rc.1
  • [Bug] [Android] Empty or Null HTML Label throws exception #2199
  • [Bug] On maximize, content of the WinUI window doesn't resize automatically. Manual resizing does it well. #1612
  • [Bug] StackLayout does not appear to update when pushed new child elements. #1494
    partner/ui-tools, 6.0.100-rc.1
  • WinUI does not draw any content [Bug] #1362
  • [Bug] Fullscreen and snapped window doesn't size content and layouts edge to edge #1273
    platform/windows 🪟
  • [Bug] Adding views in HR does not respect index and appends #2198
    6.0.100-rc.1
  • [Bug] [HotReload] Removing all or the last view in a layout does not refresh the tree #2196
    partner/ui-tools, 6.0.100-rc.1
  • AbsoluteLayout for MAUI #2192

Updated

  • [Bug] Connection refused when calling ASP.NET Core API endpoints from .NET MAUI Blazor App #1707
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • [Bug] CarouselView not rendering in Android after VS2022 Preview 3 update #2118
  • [Bug] Setting ScrollbarVisibility in ScrollView is not working #2202
  • Validate MenuItem API is complete for Desktop MacCatalyst/WinUI #1715
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/windows 🪟, 6.0.100-rc.1
  • [Bug] `Handler not found for view Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Compatibility.AbsoluteLayout` exception occur when using AbsoluteLayout #2062
    area/layout 🔲
  • [Bug] Nested childs inside ScrollView not layouting properly #2188
  • [Bug] Our error messages should be localized #2191
  • [Bug] LayoutOptions not respected in Hot Reload #2197
    6.0.100-rc.1
  • [Bug] Source name in templates should be safe for default form replacements #2176
  • BlazorWebView drag and drop does not work with MAUI Templates #2205
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • Button not rendered correctly #1941
    t/bug
  • [Bug] Blazor Maui App not resizing with change of window size #1730
    area/blazor 🕸️

PullRequests

Created

  • Make sure that Invalidate is called when items move between rows/columns #2224
  • Convert Controls ScrollTo element request to position request before sending to handler #2219
  • Bump to Reloadify3000 1.0.7 #2218
  • [main] Update dependencies from xamarin/xamarin-macios #2216
  • [main] Update dependencies from xamarin/xamarin-android #2215
  • remove TypeConversionAttribute #2210

Merged

  • BackgroundColor should trigger Background #2157
    6.0.100-rc.1
  • Force null text string to empty when updating HTML text #2223
  • Fix some Layout update bugs #2200
    6.0.100-rc.1
  • Avoid scanning obj directory with wildcard includes #2180
    6.0.100-rc.1

Updated

  • [WiP] Implement FlowDirection property in ViewHandlers #948
    6.0.100-rc.1
  • WIP: MAUI AppBuilder / DI changes #2137
    6.0.100-rc.1
  • ZStackLayout #2115
    t/enhancement ☀️
  • [Handler]Collectionview handler for iOS #2156
  • Call disconnect on shimmed NavPage Handler and fix image loading code that was running on the task pool #2160
    6.0.100-rc.1
  • AbsoluteLayout #2136
    6.0.100-rc.1
  • Update SkiaSharp and add pdb files #2195
    6.0.100-rc.1
  • Shadow Support #570
    6.0.100-rc.1
  • Workload targets improvements (#1611) 2.0 #2011
    6.0.100-rc.2
  • [Android] Only set click listener if the item is indeed clickable #1884
    area/gestures 🖖, area/a11y, 6.0.100-rc.2
  • Update Android Gallery to use Maui #1558
    6.0.100-rc.2
  • WebView Handlers #694
    6.0.100-rc.2
  • Frame Handlers #787
    6.0.100-rc.2
  • Minimal changes to support RemoteWebView #1697
    6.0.100-rc.1
  • Update to WindowsAppSdk 1.0.0-experimental #2047
    6.0.100-rc.1
  • Implement WebView2 async request handling with deferral #2055
    6.0.100-rc.1
  • ContentPage CSharp Item Template #2063
    6.0.100-rc.1
  • ContentView XAML Item Template #2064
    6.0.100-rc.1
  • ContentView CSharp Item Template #2065
    6.0.100-rc.1
  • Android/iOS Button ImageSource #2079
    t/breaking 💥, 6.0.100-rc.1
